#Text=Escondido
#Text=Escondido is a city in North San Diego County in Southern California .
#Text=Get in
#Text=Escondido is located 30 miles north of San Diego on I-15 , and 20 miles east/inland of Oceanside on State Route 78 .
#Text=The nearest major airport is the San Diego International Airport in San Diego .
#Text=The nearest general aviation airport is Palomar Airport in Carlsbad .

#Text=The North County Transit District ( NCTD ) operates bus routes throughout northern San Diego County , as well as the Sprinter , a new light rail line running along Route 78 between Escondido and Oceanside .
#Text=Buses and the Sprinter train calls at , located at 700 W Valley Pkwy .
#Text=See
#Text=San Diego Archaeological Center , 16666 San Pasqual Valley Rd , ☏ +1760 291-0370 , fax : +1760 291-0371 , ✉ info@sandiegoarchaeology.org .
#Text=M - F 9AM-4PM , Sa 10AM-2PM .
#Text=Dedicated to " the care , management , and curation of archaeological artifacts discovered in the San Diego region "
#Text=the site features over 500 collections as well as a public lecture series for visitors .
#Text=$ 2 individual , $ 5 family .
#Text=San Diego Zoo Safari Park ( formerly the San Diego Wild Animal Park ) .
#Text=Sibling to San Diego Zoo , is located a few miles east of town , in the San Pasqual Valley of North San Diego .
#Text=Do
#Text=California Center for the Arts .
#Text=Excellent local playhouse .
#Text=Cruisin Grand .
#Text=On Fridays from April 30 to September 18 , Grand Avenue downtown becomes a classic automobile showcase with a different theme every night .
#Text=Lake Hodges , Lake Dixon and Lake Wolford .
#Text=Offer fishing , boating and other recreational activities .
#Text=North Shore Lake Hodges Trail .
#Text=A 0.6-mile trail which runs along Interstate 15 , beginning at Sunset Drive ( Escondido ) , and is an excellent and moderate hiking , biking , and equestrian trail .
#Text=For mountain bikers , there is a trail that continues west .
#Text=Reidy Creek Golf Course , 2300 North Broadway , ☏ +1 760-740-2450 .
#Text=Surrounded by rugged hills and grassy parkland in a rural setting .
#Text=Buy
#Text=Amvets , 2085 E Valley Pkwy , ☏ +1760 747-2793 .
#Text=Thrift store .
#Text=Westfield North County .
#Text=Eat
#Text=Agrusa 's Sandwich Shop , 1606 E Valley Pkwy , ☏ +1760 746-0666 .
#Text=Fat Ivor 's Rib Rack , 27961 Valley Center Rd , ☏ +1760 749-0600 .
#Text=Valley Center .
#Text=Burned down in 2003 , but is now reopened ; pit barbecue smoked pork and beef ribs to drool for .
#Text=Hernandez ' Hideaway Restaurant , 19320 Lake Dr , ☏ +1760 746-1444 .

#Text=Peterson 's Donut Corner , 903 S Escondido Blvd ( Exit the 15 freeway onto W Valley Pkwy heading east , then make a right onto La Terraza Blvd ( heading south ) , next a left onto W 9th Ave ( East ) .
#Text=Continue on W 9th until reaching Escondido Blvd.
#Text=Peterson 's will be on the South-Western corner to the right . ) , ☏ +1760 745-7774 .
#Text=Open 24 hours most days of the year ( they usually close around Christmas to the start of the New Year ) .
#Text=Around $ 1 per donut .
#Text=EscoGelato , 122 South Kalmia , ☏ +1760 745-6500 .
#Text=8AM-9PM weekdays , 9AM-9PM weekends .
#Text=A locally owned gelato shop just off Grand Ave. in downtown Escondido .
#Text=Ingredients are often locally sourced from the weekly Escondido farmers ' market .
#Text=In addition to gelato , the location also serves salads , paninis , baked goods , coffee , and other beverages .
#Text=Gelato cakes and catering are available as well .
#Text=Drink
#Text=Holiday Wine Cellar , 302 W Mission Ave , ☏ +1760 745-1200 .
#Text=Has an extensive collection of wine , beer , and liquor .
#Text=Weekend afternoon and weekday evening tasting events are frequently hosted in the downstairs cellar bar ( a retro space accessible by a spiral , red carpeted staircase ) .
#Text=This local business also operates an online retailer .
#Text=Stone Brewing Company , 1999 Citricado Parkway , ☏ +1760 471-4999 .
#Text=The Escondido location is Stone Brewing Company 's headquarters .

#Text=Stone brews a variety of regular and seasonal beers , with a particular strength in IPAs ; its most famous beer is " Arrogant Bastard , " an American Strong Ale , but Stone brewery has an expansive .
#Text=For visitors , the brewery has a company store and an extensive restaurant and beer garden .
#Text=Growlers and growler fills , including many limited special release beers , are available in the company store .
#Text=Brewery tours are offered several times daily , which end in a beer tasting .
#Text=Orfila Vineyards and Winery , 13455 San Pasqual Rd , ☏ +1760 738-6500 .
#Text=Winery with an indoor and outdoor tasting room space .
#Text=Sleep
#Text=Best Western Escondido Hotel , 1700 Seven Oakes Rd , ☏ +1760 740-1700 , toll-free : +1-800-752-1710 , fax : +1760 740-9832 .
#Text=Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites , 1250 West Valley Parkway , ☏ +1760 741-7117 .
